awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: An aspiring Jewish actor moves out of his parents' Brooklyn apartment to seek his fortune in the bohemian life of Greenwich Village in 1953. He struggles to come to terms with his feelings about his mother's overbearing nature, while also trying to maintain his relationship with his girlfriend.
plot: The portrayal of pretentiously bohemian youth.
title: Next Stop, Greenwich Village
